name: nba-hack
description: A temporary fork of Nick Bottomley's great nba package, consisting of version 0.4.0 plus fixes for recent changes to stats.nba.com. Didn't have time to update to latest version. Don't judge me.

scripts.update-data: npm run update-teams; npm run update-players
scripts.build-light: npm run clear-data; browserify -s nba -o ./dist/nba-light.js ./; uglifyjs -cm -o ./dist/nba-light-min.js ./dist/nba-light.js
scripts.build-all: npm run build-light; npm run update-data; npm run build
scripts.sl: npm run style; npm run lint

author: Nick Bottomley
